title: The Temples of Malta
creator_credit: Boulton-Hawker Films, D.C. Chipperfield and P.J. Grimsey
brief_description: During the period 3000 to 2000 B.C., the peoples of the small islands of Malta and Gozo built some remarkable megalithic temples of unique design. These little known temples, together with the rock-cut tombs indicate a high level of culture unparalleled in Western Europe at the time.
creator_credit_for_label: Boulton-Hawker Films, D.C. Chipperfield and P.J. Grimsey
